name: Windows-MCP
description: Lightweight MCP Server for AI to interact with Windows OS

tools.name: Launch-Tool
tools.description: Launch an application from the Windows Start Menu by name (e.g., "notepad", "calculator", "chrome")

tools.name: Powershell-Tool
tools.description: Execute PowerShell commands and return the output with status code

tools.name: State-Tool
tools.description: Capture comprehensive desktop state including focused/opened applications, interactive UI elements (buttons, text fields, menus), informative content (text, labels, status), and scrollable areas. Optionally includes visual screenshot when use_vision=True. Essential for understanding current desktop context and available UI interactions.

tools.name: Clipboard-Tool
tools.description: Copy text to clipboard or retrieve current clipboard content. Use "copy" mode with text parameter to copy, "paste" mode to retrieve.

tools.name: Click-Tool
tools.description: Click on UI elements at specific coordinates. Supports left/right/middle mouse buttons and single/double/triple clicks. Use coordinates from State-Tool output.

tools.name: Type-Tool
tools.description: Type text into input fields, text areas, or focused elements. Set clear=True to replace existing text, False to append. Click on target element coordinates first.

tools.name: Switch-Tool
tools.description: Switch to a specific application window (e.g., "notepad", "calculator", "chrome", etc.) and bring to foreground.

tools.name: Scroll-Tool
tools.description: Scroll at specific coordinates or current mouse position. Use wheel_times to control scroll amount (1 wheel = ~3-5 lines). Essential for navigating lists, web pages, and long content.

tools.name: Drag-Tool
tools.description: Drag and drop operation from source coordinates to destination coordinates. Useful for moving files, resizing windows, or drag-and-drop interactions.

tools.name: Move-Tool
tools.description: Move mouse cursor to specific coordinates without clicking. Useful for hovering over elements or positioning cursor before other actions.

tools.name: Shorcut-Tool
tools.description: Execute keyboard shortcuts using key combinations. Pass keys as list (e.g., ['ctrl', 'c'] for copy, ['alt', 'tab'] for app switching, ['win', 'r'] for Run dialog).

tools.name: Key-Tool
tools.description: Press individual keyboard keys. Supports special keys like 'enter', 'escape', 'tab', 'space', 'backspace', 'delete', arrow keys 'up', 'down', 'left', 'right'), function keys ('f1'-'f12').

tools.name: Wait-Tool
tools.description: Pause execution for specified duration in seconds. Useful for waiting for applications to load, animations to complete, or adding delays between actions.

tools.name: Scrape-Tool
tools.description: Fetch and convert webpage content to markdown format. Provide full URL including protocol (http/https). Returns structured text content suitable for analysis.
